snippet: Regulators are looking into potential civil violations surrounding the loss that JPMorgan Chase disclosed on Thursday, raising further questions about the trading activities at the nation’s biggest bank.
abstract: Regulators are looking into potential civil violations surrounding the loss that JPMorgan Chase disclosed on Thursday, raising further questions about the trading activities at the nation’s biggest bank.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and SUSANNE CRAIG

headline.main: S.E.C. Opens Investigation Into JPMorgan's $2 Billion Loss
